thread.title: Drake Picks "Free Smoke" & "Passionfruit" As Next "More Life" Singles: Report
thread.title_full: Drake Picks "Free Smoke" & "Passionfruit" As Next "More Life" Singles: Report

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Drake Picks "Free Smoke" & "Passionfruit" As Next "More Life" Singles: Report
text:
Home > Music > Drake Picks "Free Smoke"&"Passionfruit" As Next "More Life" Singles: Report Drake Picks "Free Smoke"&"Passionfruit" As Next "More Life" Singles: Report 1 1 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Mar 23, 2017 at 11:04am Drake picks "More Life" singles #2 & #3. 
OVO, Cash Money, Universal, and the rest of the Drake braintrust have selected "Free Smoke" and "Passionfruit" as the next More Life radio singles, HipHopNMore reports. "Fake Love," the first single off More Life , peaked at #8 on the Billboard Hot 100. 
"Free Smoke" will be added to United States radio rotations on April 18th, and "Passionfruit" will follow on May 28th. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 23, 2017 at 11:04am 3 Views 
"Um, I can't even get my dog to stop peeing in the house." Drake picks "More Life" singles #2 & #3. 
OVO, Cash Money, Universal, and the rest of the Drake braintrust have selected "Free Smoke" and "Passionfruit" as the next More Life radio singles, HipHopNMore reports. "Fake Love," the first single off More Life , peaked at #8 on the Billboard Hot 100. 
"Free Smoke" will be added to United States radio rotations on April 18th, and "Passionfruit" will follow on May 28th.
